abstract: Report finds that British television host Jimmy Savile had freewheeling access in hospital where he sexually abused more than 60 patients over two decades.
lead_paragraph: A report on the Stoke Mandeville hospital found that Mr. Savile, a TV host, abused 60 people there as officials ignored complaints.

headline.main: British Hospital Ignored Sexual Abuse Complaints Against Jimmy Savile, Inquiry Finds

snippet: A report on the Stoke Mandeville hospital found that Mr. Savile, a TV host, abused 60 people there as officials ignored complaints.
